text:
NARRATOR: TBS and
Patron Tequila present

"How to Enjoy the Second Season
of Search Party Responsibly."

I'm Igor Zukowiec,
and I'll show you
how to make the Silver Sling.

You'll need an ounce and a
half of Roca Patron Silver,

3/4 of an ounce
of sweet vermouth,

3/4 of an ounce of
fresh lemon juice,

3/4 of an ounce of vanilla
and cinnamon syrup.
You want to cut an orange.
Let's add some ice and shake it.
[ICE RATTLING]

Strain the cocktail to
your champagne flute

and top it off with
some champagne.
[CORK POP]
[FIZZING]

And squeeze that peel
to release the oils.

No need to search for the
perfect sweet holiday cocktail
because we've solved the case.

NARRATOR: Brought to you by
Patron Tequila, simply perfect.
Enjoy responsibly.
